ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Credit_Card_Processing__c = TRUE, OR( ISBLANK(Account.Name), ISBLANK(Account.BillingAddress), ISBLANK(Contact_Name__c), ISBLANK(Phone__c), ISBLANK(Email__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Complete Business Name, Business Address, Contact Name, Phone Number, and Email Address before checking “Credit Card Processing”. Checking this box will trigger an email to Archie, and the client.
